More non-white artists were nominated recently, but that doesn’t always guarantee more wins

Since 2018, over half of the nominations in the major categories went to artists of color.

Data only includes Grammys nominations in the “Album of the Year”, “Record of the Year”, and “Best New Artist” categories from 1990 to 2023.
